column4: Wow! there's a lot of people here. Maybe I could get what I hope will be a simple question answered....  ;-P

I am completely new to Linux, but have been tasked with putting together a computer for our church's gradeschool which will act as a Librarian's desk PC for their small library. I found a full featured open source library management package which sounds perfect for what we want, but it runs on Linux only.
